title: Font for my Blog
content:
hi, i'm starting a blog about ignorance, not just here in the UK but to open it up to the world in general and i want to use a really ignorant font for the titles and the banner across the top. does anyone know if that FontPlayer guy has designed any fonts, because his posts here are SO TOTALLY ignorant that i think it would be perfect to use his work. also, what colour is ignorance? thanks again for your help.

PS the judy invites were a huge hit!!!
author: NigellaL

comments.content:
Not sure about the font, but Green is considered the color of ignorance.  
It doesn't get much more ignorant than the [KKK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045244/http:/images.google.ca/images?svnum=10&hl=en&lr=&q=KKK+poster&btnG=Search)

Uncanny!  
 [http://typophile.com/node/19366](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045244/http:/typophile.com/node/19366 "http://typophile.com/node/19366") \_  
:-)

\> what colour is ignorance?

Interesting question. Must be brown I guess.

hhp

_\> does anyone know if that FontPlayer guy has designed  
\> any fonts, because his posts here are SO TOTALLY  
\> ignorant that i think it would be perfect to use his work._

Ouch. That's kind of rude, isn't it?

"Ouch. That’s kind of rude, isn’t it?"

Can't you tell i was just being cheeky? you Yanks are so sensitive sometimes!
What kind of ignorance? Simple lack of knowledge? The tabula rasa is either blank paper or black board.

Ignorance is [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045244/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm) unfortunately I doubt your readers would readily identify it, unless you want an in-joke. A state of darkness could be used as a metaphor for ignorance, or red, white and blue should offend as many ignorami as possible. [George Orwell knew a thing or two](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045244/http:/www.stampandshout.com/shop/window-decals/ignorance-is-strength.php)  
Tim
Here are [some words about being rude on Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045244/http:/typophile.com/readme).
